suite.name: Beecow Register data driven

test.name: TC001_Register Fail With EMAIL validation - Data Driven

kw.name: Open Browser And Goes To Register Page
Open Browser And Click GetStarted Button
kw.doc: GLOBAL_KEY: Open Browser And Click GetStarted Button

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.
kw.msg: Opening browser 'gc' to base url 'https://beecow.mediastep.ca' through remote server at 'http://localhost:4444/wd/hub'.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Select Language
kw.doc: GLOBAL_KEY: Click link language in getstarted popup

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button GetStarted
kw.doc: GLOBAL_KEY: Click button getstarted when page is open

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button Sign Up Header
kw.doc: GLOBAL_KEY: Click Button Sign Up Header

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: REGISTER_KEY: Input Values Register Popup Page
